ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: ok... I have lots of fun not cheating and in every game I play I have at least one 100% legit character, and I play that character to have fun not cheating...
ygData.messageBody:
ok...

I have lots of fun not cheating and in every game I play I have at least one
100% legit character, and I play that character to have fun not cheating...

but other times I feel like just roamping around the game with a hacked
character to have fun with things my real character can't touch/see yet.

Right now I'd love to go take a look at Lady Vox (just see her in the game,
not kill her, just look) but I have a feeling that if my 8th level Half-Elf
Druid did manage to get to her somehow I'd see that familiar LOADING...
PLEASE WAIT msg before I could blink.

make more sense now?

Omeg
